title: Marketing website for “Beniwal Music Center” (tractor music systems, modifications, electrician mechanic, contact)

requirements.text: Create a responsive website titled “Beniwal Music Center” with a clear home/landing section that introduces the shop and summarizes the main offerings.

quotes: create a website for my shop of music system for tractors with title " Beniwal Music Center "

Create a website titled "Beniwal Music Center" with:
• A home page describing the shop

acceptanceCriteria: Page shows the title “Beniwal Music Center” prominently.
Landing section includes a short description of the shop in English.
Layout is responsive (mobile + desktop) and visually coherent.

requirements.text: Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Music Systems” describing the products/services offered (informational content only; no checkout required).

quotes: • A section for tractor music systems

acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Tractor Music Systems” is present and easy to find via scrolling/navigation.
Section contains English descriptive text (not placeholder lorem ipsum).

requirements.text: Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Modification Materials” and include messaging that the materials are available at reasonable prices.

quotes: also we sell tractor modification materials at reasonable price
• A section for tractor modification materials

acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Tractor Modification Materials” is present.
Section explicitly mentions “reasonable prices” (or equivalent phrasing) in English.

requirements.text: Add a dedicated section describing “Electrical Mechanic Services” and clearly state that an electrical mechanic is available.

quotes: • A section for electrical mechanic services

acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Electrical Mechanic Services” (or very similar) is present.
Section clearly states availability of an electrical mechanic in English.

requirements.text: Add a “Contact” section with contact information fields that can be filled in later (use clear placeholders such as phone number, address, and business hours).

quotes: and a section for contact information further information will be provide later on

acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Contact” is present.
Contact section includes placeholders for at least: Phone, Address, and Hours.
Placeholders are clearly marked as “To be added” / “Coming soon” (or similar), not fake data.

requirements.text: Add simple navigation (e.g., header links) to jump to: Home, Tractor Music Systems, Tractor Modification Materials, Electrical Mechanic Services, and Contact.

quotes:
A home page describing the shop
• A section for tractor music systems
• A section for tractor modification materials
• A section for electrical mechanic services
• A contact section

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation is visible on desktop and usable on mobile (e.g., stacked or menu).
Clicking each nav item scrolls/jumps to the correct section.

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and section styling) suitable for a tractor/automotive shop brand; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.

quotes: create a website for my shop of music system for tractors with title " Beniwal Music Center "

acceptanceCriteria: Typography, buttons/links, and section styling look consistent across the page.
Primary color palette is not predominantly blue/purple.
Design feels appropriate for an automotive/tractor services shop (clean, bold, practical).

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets (logo + hero banner) to the site and store them under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: create a website for my shop of music system for tractors with title " Beniwal Music Center "

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Logo is displayed in the header/hero area.
Hero/banner image is displayed in the landing section without layout shift or distortion.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths defined by the template.

required: Logo mark + wordmark reading “Beniwal Music Center”, bold automotive/tractor-shop style, high contrast (bmc-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner illustration featuring a tractor silhouette and speakers/audio theme, warm rugged palette (bmc-hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
